adjective.description: Relating to or denoting amphibians belonging to the family Salmandridae or the suborder Salamandroidea.
examples: absence of the cloacal glands that function in salamandroid fertilization strongly suggests external fertilization

noun.description: An amphibian of the family Salmandridae or the suborder Salamandroidea, comprising the largest group of salamanders.
examples: the recent description of this specimen seems to confirm the predicted presence of salamandroids in the Jurassic

origin: Mid 19th century: from Latin salamandroides, or Salamandridae + -oid (sense 1).
